Title: WindowsQR
Description:
Windows QR is a proof of concept written in c# about capturing a qr code using a webcam in a WPF application runinng in a desktop computer with Windows 7 or similars.

It uses AForge.Vision to wrap the DirectShow complexity and zxing library to decode the qr code.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Windows QR is a proof of concept about capturing a qr code using a webcam in a WPF application.

It uses AForge.Vision to wrap the DirectShow complexity and zxing library to decode the qr code.

 

Tests performed with a simple Macally VGA (640x480) Webcam. It can recognize the wikipedia qr code as well as other qr codes PRINTED in a paper. To scan a qr directly from a screen or display, you should have a better camera (Logitec h HD Pro Webcam 910 for example)

External libs used

ZXING
AForge
